entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 9:06 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:01 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
